argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat1rhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mat1rhmval.a | |- A = ( { E } Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mat1rhmval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mat1rhmval.o | |- O = <. E , E >. |
| 5 |  | mat1rhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> { <. O , x >. } ) |
| 6 | 2, 1, 4 | #P_mat1dimbas | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V /\ X e. K ) -> { <. O , X >. } e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mat1rhmval | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V /\ X e. K ) -> ( F ` X ) = { <. O , X >. } ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V /\ X e. K ) -> B = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V /\ X e. K ) -> ( F ` X ) e. B ) |
